title: Bartel on Journey to Mali - claim support

content.question: Which of the following claims is best supported by the information in the excerpt?

choices.label: West Africa was a center of learning.
Islam was introduced to West Africa through trade.
The Mali Empireâ€™s power was based on the use of steel weapons.
West Africa exported a variety of goods to other regions.

content.answer: West Africa exported a variety of goods to other regions.
